text: Alain Fauré (1 October 1962 – 12 July 2018) was a French politician. He was born in Pamiers, France. He served as a Deputy from 2012 to 2017 and as Mayor of Les Pujols from 2001 to 2014. On 12 July 2018, Fauré died at his home in Les Pujols, France, aged 55.L'ancien député de l'Ariège Alain Fauré est décédé == References == Category:1962 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Socialist Party (France) politicians Category:French mayors Category:People from Ariège Category:Politicians from Occitanie
title: Alain Fauré
